name: Halloween Night 1999
description:
Halloween Night 1999 is a Silent Hill/Resident Evil inspired game in the PS1 art style we made for Scream Jam October 2021! 

Two best friends go trick or treating but one goes missing! You have to find him before its too late! Good old fashion tank controls (Didn't have enough time to figure out a newer control method too haha), locked camera angles, and a schlocky story to boot! 

Created by two of us for this Scream Jam we also had assistance for music and voices!  Girls voice by Oli Zhai and Music by Edmund Ng. Thank you both so much for the help!  

Gamepad and keyboard compatible.
